snippet: Theo Zwanziger, Germany’s former top soccer official, told the newsmagazine Der Spiegel that Germany had used a secret slush fund to pay bribes for the right to host the 2006 World Cup.
abstract: Former German soccer official Theo Zwanziger reports that secret slush fund was used for bribes in order to secure country's right to host 2006 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Theo Zwanziger, Germany’s former top soccer official, told the newsmagazine Der Spiegel that Germany had used a secret slush fund to pay bribes for the right to host the 2006 World Cup.
